Title: Printing, Fulfilment and Mailing Services
Description:
Charnwood Borough Council are seeking tenders from suppliers to provide a secure, efficient and effective service for the printing, fulfilment and postage of garden waste permits to the service subscribers within the Borough.

The Council has operated a chargeable garden waste collection service since 2004. The take up of this service has grown over this period and is now provided to around 35,000 properties within the Borough.
 
The Council run an anniversary renewal/ billing system where new permits are issued every month based on the original subscription date. The number of monthly renewals varies across the year with a low figure of around 1500 through to a high of 4,000. 
 
Charnwood Borough Council runs a permit system to assist with the identification of valid subscribers at the kerbside. This is via a secure numbered sticker fixed to the bin and the Council is seeking a single contractor operating on a complete fulfilment basis to manage the design, production and distribution of the secure permits on its behalf.

To respond to this opportunity, please visit: https://www.delta-esourcing.com/respond/B46G735M35

Your response must be completed and submitted electronically via the Delta eSourcing Response Manager by the deadline of the 18/09/2019 at 12:00. 

Please register on the Delta e-Sourcing site to respond, if you are already registered simply use your existing username and password. 

If you experience problems with the Delta portal then please contact the Delta helpdesk - helpdesk@delta-esourcing.com or call +44 8452707050 for further assistance.

Title: Supply of Garden Waste Bin Subscription Stickers including Data Tracking Portal
Description:
Fenland District Council require a specialist printing supplier for the printing and posting of Garden Waste Bin Stickers, approx. 22,000 per annum currently.  

The successful supplier will also be required to provide a web portal for uploading of .CSV files along with logging the unique property reference number (UPRN).  The web portal should provide a full reporting facility to enable the council to see the status of orders such as printed, dispatched, cancelled and replacements all linked to the UPRN. 

Therefore suppliers with relevant experience of Wheelie Bin Subscription Stickers and Services are invited to tender.  Expressions of interest to receive tender documents to procurement@fenland.gov.uk

Tender return deadline Monday 9th October 2017.  (12 noon).
